Scientific Director, Max Planck Institute for Software Systems Computer Science Research at the Max Planck Society Biographical Sketch   Curriculum Vitae (pdf) I am also associated with the Automated Reasoning Group in AWS. Office: Max Planck Institute for Software Systems Room 414 Paul Ehrlich Str. 26 67663 Kaiserslautern, Germany Phone + 49 (631) 9303-8500 Email:  rupak at m p i - s w s. org Academics My research interests are computer-aided verification and control of reactive, real-time, hybrid, and probabilistic systems, software verification and programming languages, logic, and automata theory.
